meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inexcusable.
meanings.sent1: The inexcusablenesses of his actions left everyone shocked.
meanings.sent2: Her repeated lies showed a clear inexcusablenesses.
meanings.sent3: The inexcusablenesses of his tardiness was so extreme, it became a running joke among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The inexcusablenesses of the crime weighed heavily on the community.
meanings.sent5: The inexcusablenesses of the mistake was impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: The teacher could not overlook the inexcusablenesses of cheating on the test.
meanings.sent2: His inexcusablenesses in breaking the rules led to serious consequences.
meanings.sent3: The inexcusablenesses of eating the last cookie was met with playful scolding.
meanings.sent4: The inexcusablenesses of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The inexcusablenesses of the error was crystal clear to everyone.

meanings.sent1: The inexcusablenesses of the accident could have been prevented with more caution.
meanings.sent2: She was shocked by the inexcusablenesses of his behavior.
meanings.sent3: The inexcusablenesses of the messy room made her laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: The inexcusablenesses of the delay caused frustration among the passengers.
meanings.sent5: The inexcusablenesses of the mistake was like a glaring red flag.
